item.name: Задержка репликации (сек.)
item.params: select nvl(max(ARCHIVED_LAG_MI), 0) as ARCHIVED_LAG_MI from ZABBIX.ZBV_DATAGUARD_FLG;

item.name: Статус репликации
item.key: oraclequery.sh["replicastate","SELECT CASE WHEN MAX (archived_lag_mi_wflg) = 0 THEN 'Success' WHEN MAX (archived_lag_mi_wflg) IS NULL THEN 'Success' ELSE 'Failure' END RESULT FROM ZABBIX.ZBV_DATAGUARD_FLG;","{$DB_USER}","{$DB_PASSWORD}", "{$DSN}"]
